name: OneChanbara Z: Kagura
description:
A new chapter in the "Onechanbara" series.

New action! A new game system! !! And ... a new heroine! !! !!

The all-new "Onechanbara" begins with a command given to a blood-sucking sister.
It was an order to kill the former heroines Aya and Saki. .. .. .. ..

■ Evolving combination attack
Kagura (Kagura CV: Miyuki Sawashiro (dual role)) and Saya (Saya CV: Miyuki Sawashiro (dual role)) can use two different combination attacks.
This attack, which is launched with the X button or Y button, can freely go back and forth between each combo route by changing the button input. Devise an attack method according to the situation.

■ Battle mode change with 2 main weapons
Kagura has two types of weapons: a sword and a tagger, and Saaya has a chainsaw and a knuckle. Switch between these to change the battle mode. It was

Considering the characteristics of the weapon, incorporate it into the combination according to the situation.

■ Extreme sub-weapon
It is possible to attack using a unique sub-weapon in addition to the two types of main weapons.
There are various ways to use it by always launching attacks with the same sub-weapon and interweaving them during the combination, regardless of the character's battle mode.
